title: A reversible self-assembled molecular layer for lithium metal batteries with high energy/power densities at ultra-low temperatures
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01298D, Paper
Weili Zhang, Yang Lu, Qingbin Cao, Hao Liu, Qingqing Feng, Pan Zhou, Yingchun Xia, Wenhui Hou, Shuaishuai Yan, Kai Liu
We have demonstrated a molecular interface engineering strategy to address the design dilemma of low-temperature electrolytes for lithium metal batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
